title: Meet the Newest Pokemon - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.18.19
description:
Imran and Gary Whitta talk about Sirfetch'd, Twitch's sexual content crackdown, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:41 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:05 - New Pokemon Revealed to Be Farfetch'd Evolution
00:17:02 - Twitch sexual content crackdown causing confusion - GamesIndustry.biz via James Batchelor
00:28:45 -  How Call of Duty: Modern Warfare’s cross-play will work - Polygon via Michael McWhertor
00:36:50 -  REQUIRED READING: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare and the Cruel Realities of White Phosphorous- IGN via John Phipps
00:43:20 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:52:05 - “You each have a very colored history in the Video Game industry…” - The Nano Biologist
00:56:04 - “Are you surprised to see Stadia’s Founder's Edition selling out?” - The Five Star Man
01:00:28 - “When I saw the E3 headlines yesterday, I got excited.” - Sian
01:06:32 - Squad Up: doug - PS4 - jmduknz
01:07:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Imran
